Over two dozen people were hospitalized following a Brooklyn apartment fire, while an armed man disrupted a Wikipedia conference in NYC; additionally, heavy rain is expected to affect Monday's commute, and thousands rallied against Trump in a citywide protest.

### Risks & Alerts

- Over 2 dozen hospitalized following Brooklyn apartment fire.
